00028 #ifndef _QICSICELL_H
00029 #define _QICSICELL_H
00030 
00031 #include <qpoint.h>
00032 #include <qvaluelist.h>
00033 #include <qvaluevector.h>
00034 
00054 class QicsICell : public QPoint
00055 {
00056   public:
00060     QicsICell(int row, int col)
00061         : QPoint(col, row) {}
00062 
00066     QicsICell(void) : QPoint(-1, -1) {}
00067   
00071     inline int row(void) const     { return y(); }
00075     inline int column(void) const  { return x(); }
00076 
00080     inline void setRow(int row)    { setY(row); }
00084     inline void setColumn(int col)   { setX(col); }
00085 
00090     inline bool isValid(void) const { return ((x() >= 0) && (y() >= 0)); }
00091 };
00092 
00093 typedef QValueVector<QicsICell> QicsICellV;
00094 typedef QValueVector<QicsICell *> QicsICellPV;
00095 typedef QValueList<QicsICell> QicsICellQVL;
00096 
00097 #endif /* _QICSICELL_H */
